room_title: Escape room "The Bomb" by MindQuest Escape Games in West Palm Beach
room_address: 103 US Hwy 1, Unit C1, Jupiter FL 33477
room_description: This is a highly classified mission of the utmost importance. General Beauregard, one of our nation's most decorated war heroes has gone missing. We believe that he has been forced into hiding in an attempt to protect his family from the threat of a notorious international terrorist faction we know only as "Them." Intelligence indicates that "They" have broken into the General's office and hidden a Bomb intended to destroy him. You must sneak inside under the cover of darkness, locate THE BOMB and defuse it before it explodes. Be careful, and be quick! "They" are watching!
